path.style: stroke: lightgray; stroke-width: 48; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; fill: none;
stroke: lightgray; stroke-width: 60; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; fill: none;

div.style: position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; opacity: 0.5; background-color: lightgray; display: none; z-Index: 99;

svg.style: display: none; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0;
